Question: And through Alvin, this person has another two grandchildren who are six and nine years younger than Amarah.
Hints: This person's recent ancestors migrated north from Faceville, Georgia, Palatka, Florida, and Virginia.
On December 18 through 20, 2009, this person performed in the Candlelight Processional at Epcot in Walt Disney World.
In 2012, this person guest starred as Jane Marsh, Sue Heck's guidance counselor in the TV series, The Middle.
